EmailTemplate.subject: School Readiness Talk
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.OwnerFirstName}
It's unfortunate that you weren't able to attend our recent School Readiness Talk. There are some useful information and links from the presentation in the attached 'School Readiness' document.
The next event on our Kinder calendar is our Kindergarten Open Morning that we are having on September 11. It's wonderful opportunity for pre school parents and children to come along and see our Kindergarten class in action, meet our Infants teaching staff and tour our Junior School facilities. I will be sending out invitations for that event soon.
I look forward to future opportunities for us to continue to work together for great outcomes for our school starters.
Regards
Bruce Perry Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
phone 02 92869507 email BPerry@sacs.nsw.edu.au
